=== Current Issues ===
* Must enable restricted drivers for nVidia and Broadcom (or use NDISWrapper) to get full hardware support.
* Media keys might work if the media application is focused.
* Wireless cannot use 802.11n features

* System Manufacturer: Hewlett-Packard
* System Product Name: HP Pavilion dv2500 Notebook PC
* System Version: F.15
